title: VSO Software PhotoDVD V2.9.1.2
description:
VSO Software PhotoDVD V2.9.1.2

 <a href="
http://www.vso-software.fr/products/photodvd/photodvd.php" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.vso-software.fr/products/photodvd/photodvd.php</a>



VSO PhotoDVD is one of the best DVD Slideshow Software programs to create slideshows on DVD. Share your digital pictures on DVD with your 
friends and family with any home DVD player. 
PhotoDVD animates your images to make a DVD photo Slide show. You can add music and comments to your pictures. The result is attractive 
and vibrant. The product is very easy to use and burns photos to DVD with any DVD writer.
A wizard style interface lets you select the pictures from files or folders. You can add multiple music playlists to play in the background. 
Add comments to your pictures that work like DVD subtitles that can be activated or not during the photo slideshow. The transitions and 
animations of your pictures are completely automatic and enhance the experience of sharing your best memories. Use focus points to highlight 
the details of your pictures, like the sparkling eyes of your new born baby. You can watch photos on TV as a picture slideshow with any 
regular DVD Player.
Our VSO slideshow maker gives you a simple solution to create animated DVDs. Animate pictures of your vacations, holidays, baby pictures and 
events like weddings, and family reunions. 

 

Key Features:
Support picture formats: JPG, GIF, BMP, ANI, PCX, EMF, WMF, and more...
Support native RAW format : Canon RAW .CR2, Nikon .NEF, .DNG, Minolta and more...
Supported audio formats for background music: MP3, WMA, OGG, MPC, WAV, APE
Awesome pan and zoom effects
Fullscreen (4:3) and Widescreen (16:9) output
DVD output on DVD-R/RW and DVD+R/RW media (Single or Double Layer)
Specify a focus point for each picture (highlighted by zoom techniques)
Basic picture editing (rotation, black and white or color, etc.)
Up to three subtitles tracks (for different languages)
Up to three audio tracks for different background music
Supports both PAL and NTSC formats
Fast and highgrade MPEG2 encoder
Universal DVD burning engine included
Multilingual support (available languages...)
Optimized for Windows XP and Windows Vista
